startUrl.title: Start URL
startUrl.description: The URL to start crawling from

crawlUrls.title: Crawl Multiple Pages
crawlUrls.description: Whether to crawl internal links and analyze multiple pages. If false, only the startUrl will be analyzed.

maxPages.title: Maximum Pages to Check
maxPages.description: Maximum number of pages to crawl and analyze for images (only applies when crawlUrls is true)

maxImagesPerPage.title: Max Images Per Page
maxImagesPerPage.description: Maximum number of images to analyze per page

includeImageSizeAnalysis.title: Include Image Size Analysis
includeImageSizeAnalysis.description: Whether to analyze image sizes and file types

includeAltTextAnalysis.title: Include Alt Text Analysis
includeAltTextAnalysis.description: Whether to analyze alt text for images

userAgent.title: User Agent
userAgent.description: User agent string to use for requests

waitForPageLoad.title: Wait for Page Load
waitForPageLoad.description: Time to wait for page to fully load (in milliseconds)
